Been playing this game sins 2010 and i still love it today, the graphics aren't that bad. I rember those late nights when you sat up and shooting zombies =P. Love this game more then i love Counter Strike : Global Offensive, cuz the weapons are much better in source and what they are in CS:GO, Easier to handle the deagle, i really hope that valve bring that back when they gonna realese the new CS. So just buy this game, cuz i know you gonna love it, if you like to slaughter zombies and spraying with the old ak-47, Have a good day!

Всем привет!
Прошу уделить минутку две на мой обзор по CSS!
Сейчас CSS стала не очень популярна так как вышла CS:GO и переманила всех игроков к себе.
CCS скоро умрёт так как 1.6 и её заполанят школьник.
Конешно время переходить к самому обзору!

И-так в игре к сожалению очень мало оружия как и в 1.6 но играть всёравно интересно и хорошо!
Есть очень много режимов так-как "Jail,AWP,AIM,DE,CS,ZM" и ещё много каких но мой любимый это 35HP на ножах.


Нууу обзор получился коротким и я думаю скучноватым но не пренебрегайте моего совета и поиграйте в эту игру
а лутше поиграйте в CS:GO!

I ended up playing this for a bit after NovaLogic went bust which ended devolpment of the Delta Force series. Those were some of the earliest and best online multiplayer fps's. It took me a while to adapt to CS:S, accusing everyone of cheating like a proper noob. After a while things just clicked and I could handle myself well. It's great fun and you can still find crowded servers. I consider it a much better game than CS:GO. To me, CS:S's true successor is Insurgency, which I recommend as well.

Its a casual shooter with various gamemodes. I didn't have a bad experience with it. I rate it an overall  {[  7/10  ]}

 Pros:
-It's a good time waister.
-some good server communities
-Runs pretty well
-Need it to fix some Gmod texture errors (can use a seperate, free fix online)
-Very casual
 
 Cons:
-Graphics arent the best (as to be expected, if you aren't a graphic nut then you're fine)
-Slightly toxic overall comunity (not anywhere near as bad as league or Gmod)

Would be nice if there was a way of leveling, Would be nice if there where skins, but if you are really worried about skins then get CS:GO
(MY OPINION) Probably valves best game.................................... Still waiting for Half Life 3.
Love it

I love Counter Strike Source. It was one of the first games which I purchased on my account. It got me into the Counter Strike series and from then I own all of the Counter Strike game on Steam, and I also pre-ordered Counter Strike Global Offensive because of how much I loved the Counter Strike series of games. The game has so much more to do than Call Of Duty, you have to have a good knowledge of the maps on the game.

Also you have to learn the spray pattern of the guns in order to effectively kill the enemy before they get you. There are so many more possible ways to go on the maps than you may be aware of. I would recommend this game as a game to purchase if you ever want to have a relaxing game to play. Also this game has many game modes which can be played which adds more content to the game than other wise may have been thought.
:D Tak určitě bych ji doporučil. Ze všech CS jsem si ji oblíbil zatím nejvíc. Dle mého je tu snažší ovládání než v CSgo.. (ale to je asi jen věc názoru)... Super zabiják probdělých nocí :)

This game has brought me so many memories, long lasting friend ships and so much nostalgia.
CS:S is a game I wish still had a good kick of population on it for some servers.

Deathrun and Minigames were the servers that caught my attention the most because it wasn't super serious competitive stuff like CS:GO was, or so I thought.

Counter strike: Source will always have a special place in my heart for video games.
